      Returns a couple of stations, one for bike rental and one for bike return, which lets the user go from one localization to another according to the given path strategy.

    • Uses of NoSuchStationExistException in fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.core.statistic

      Methods in fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.core.statistic that throw NoSuchStationExistException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double StationBalance.occupationRate(Station station)
      This method returns the rate of occupation of a given station from the date of its creation to the present, ie. the sum on each parking slot of the time during which this parking slot has been occupied or offline divided by its total time of existence.
      static double StationBalance.occupationRate(Station station, Date start, Date end)
      This method returns the rate of occupation of a given station during a given time window, ie. the sum on each parking slot of the time during which this parking slot has been occupied or offline divided by the total available time.

    • Uses of NoSuchStationExistException in fr.ecp.IS1220.myVelib.core.system

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Station Localization.getClosestAvailableStation()
      This method browses the list of stations on the network and picks the one which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available parking slot.
      Station Localization.getClosestAvailableStation(boolean isPlus)
      This method browses the public list of stations on the network and picks the one of specified type which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available parking slot.
      Station Localization.getClosestStationWithBicycle()
      This method browses the public list of stations on the network and picks the one which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available bicycle.
      Station Localization.getClosestStationWithBicycle(java.lang.String bicycleType)
      This method browses the public list of stations on the network and picks the one which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available bicycle of specified type.
      java.util.ArrayList<Station> Localization.getStationsInRadius(double radius)
      This method browses the public list of stations on the network and returns the ones situated in a given radius around this localization.
      Station MyVelibNetwork.station(long stationID)
      Returns the right station
